title: Donna Hightower - Take One! + bonus (1958-59) Fresh Sound
description:
DONNA HIGHTOWER - TAKE ONE! + GEE, BABY, AIN'T I GOOD TO YOU?

********************
 NEW RIP WITH SCANS
********************

Donna Hightower "Take One!" with Sid Feller's All-Star Group (Capitol T 1133)

Joe Wilder - trumpet
Ben Webster - tenor sax
Mundell Lowe - guitar
Hank Jones - piano
George Duvivier - bass
Don Lamond - drums

Recorded in New York, 1958

1. Perfidia (Albert Dominguez-Milton Leeds)
2. Maybe You'll Be There (Rube Bloom-Sammy Gallup)
3. Lover Come Back To Me (Sigmund Romberg-Oscar Hammerstein II)
4. There, I've Said It Again (Redd Evans-Dave Mann)
5. Because Of You (Arthur Hammerstein-Duley Wilson)
6. Please Don't Take Your Love Away From Me (Henry Nemo)
7. C'est La Vie (Edward R. White-Mack Wolfson)
8. Too Young (Sid Lippman-Sylvia Dee)
9. Baby, Get Lost (Billy Moore Jr.)
10. I Get A Kick Out Of You (Cole Porter)
11. Anytime, Anyday, Anywhere (Washigton-Young-Wiley)
12. Trouble In Mind (Richard M. Jones)

Donna Hightower "Gee, Baby, Ain't I Good To You?" (Capitol ST 1273)
with Orchestra Conducted by Sid Feller

The personnel features...

Chauncey Welsh - trombone
Georgie Auld - tenor sax
Hank Jones - piano

and probably...

Barry Galbraith - guitar
Milt Hinton - bass
Osie Johnson - drums

Recorded in New York, 1959

13. Every Day I Have The Blues (Peter Chatman)
14. Gee, Baby, Ain't I Good To You (Redman-Razaf)
15. All Or Nothing At All (Lawrence-Altman)
16. I Laughed To Keep From Crying (Brown-Pober)
17. Lonesome And Sorry (Conrad-Davis)
18. The First To Know (Donna Brinson)
19. The Blues Don't Care (Vic Abrams)
20. Can't Help It (Segal-Fisher)
21. Born To Be Blue (Wells-Torme)
22. I'll Be Around (Alec Wilder)
23. A Cottage For Sale (Robinson-Conely)
24. I'm Alone Because Of You (Siras-Young)

2009 Fresh Sound Records
